name: Watched America's Test Kitchen, Season 17 - Elegant Fall Dinner
America's Test Kitchen, Season 17 - Elegant Fall Dinner

item.value: America's Test Kitchen, Season 17 - Elegant Fall Dinner

content.html:
Host Bridget Lancaster shows host Julia Collin Davison how to make the best Tuscan-Style Roast Pork with Garlic and Rosemary. Next, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews wine accessories in the Equipment Corner. Then, test cook Becky Hays reveals the secrets to making the perfect Farro Salad with Asparagus, Sugar Snap Peas, and Tomatoes.

Watched on Fire TV
content.value:

Watched on Fire TV

summary: Do you like the new season as much as the old now that Christopher Kimball isn't on the show anymore? The main segments seem to be a lot cheesier to me now without his gravitas and straightforward manner.
